item.title: ZOHO CRM adds call logging for leads & contacts
item.description: ZOHO CRM a web based (SaaS) customer relationship management solution (CRM) recently added a bunch of new features. For sometime users were able to record events like meetings but now there is an easy way to record daily / regular contact like telephone calls.** ZOHO CRM Call Logger The Call Logger button is on the view Contact Detail page Click on the Add Call button to reveal the call logger screen.
